talents.name: Dark Ritual
talents.info_text:
Increases your spell critical damage multiplier by 38%, 52%, 62%, 71%, 79%.

The multiplier will increase with your Spellpower.

Project a corrupted blast of power that deals 79, 108, 129, 148, 164 blight damage and removes up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 magical or physical effect(s) from any creatures caught in the radius 3 ball.

For each effect, the creature has a chance to resist based on its spell save.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Corrupted Negation

talents.info_text:
Infect your target with a corrosive worm that deals 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 acid damage per turn for 10 turns.

If the target dies while the worm is inside, it will explode, doing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 acid damage in a radius of 4.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and can critical.
talents.name: Corrosive Worm

talents.info_text:
A furious poison storm rages around the caster in a radius of 4 for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Each creature hit by the storm is poisoned for 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 nature damage over 6 turns.

Poisoning is cumulative; the longer they stay in the storm, the higher the poison damage they take.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and can critical.
talents.name: Poison Storm

name: blight
description: Bring corruption and decay to all who oppose you.

talents.info_text:
You extract corrupted blood from your own body, hitting everything in a frontal cone of radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 for 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 blight damage.

Each creature hit has a 36%, 54%, 64%, 70%, 75% chance of being infected by a random disease, doing 149, 202, 243, 278, 309 blight damage and weakening either Constitution, Strength or Dexterity for 6 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blood Spray

talents.info_text:
Project a bolt of corrupted blood, doing 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 blight damage and healing you for half the damage done.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blood Grasp

talents.info_text:
Make the blood of all creatures around you in radius 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 boil, doing 128, 174, 209, 239, 265 blight damage and slowing them by 20%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blood Boil

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on the corruption you bring, increasing your spell critical chance by 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17%.

Each time your spells go critical, you enter a blood rage for 5 turns, increasing your blight and acid damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38%.

The critical chance and damage increase will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blood Fury

name: blood
description: Harness the power of blood, both your own and your foes'.

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a spear of bones, doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 physical damage to all targets in line.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Bone Spear

talents.info_text:
Grab a target and teleport it to your side, pinning it there with a bone rising from the ground for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The bone will also deal 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 physical damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Bone Grab

talents.info_text:
Fire bone spears in all directions, hitting all foes within radius 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 for 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 physical damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Bone Nova

talents.info_text:
Bone shields start circling around you. They will each fully absorb one attack.

1, 2, 4, 5, 6 shield(s) will be generated when first activated.

Then every 30, 15, 7, 6, 5 turns a new one will be created if not full.
talents.name: Bone Shield

description: Curse your foes, hindering and crippling them.
name: curses

talents.info_text:
Curses your target, decreasing its Defense and all saves by 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 for 10 turns.

The effects will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Curse of Defenselessness

talents.info_text:
Curses your target, decreasing all damage they do by 18%, 23%, 27%, 30%, 32% for 10 turns.

The effects will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Curse of Impotence

talents.info_text:
Curses your target, stopping any natural healing and dealing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage each turn for 10 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Curse of Death

talents.info_text:
Curses your target, decreasing all its resistances by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% for 7 turns.

The effect will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Curse of Vulnerability

description: Hex your foes, hindering and crippling them.
name: hexes

talents.info_text:
Hexes your target, dazing it and everything in a 2 radius ball around it for 3 turns, and giving 33%, 40%, 45%, 48%, 51% chance to daze affected targets again each turn for 20 turns.

The chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Pacification Hex

talents.info_text:
Hexes your target and everything within a radius 2 ball around it for 20 turns. Each time an affected target uses a resource (stamina, mana, vim, …), it takes 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 fire damage.

In addition, the cooldown of any talent used while so hexed is increased by 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58% + 1 turn.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Burning Hex

talents.info_text:
Hexes your target and everything within a radius 2 ball around it. Each time they do damage, they take 12%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% of the same damage for 20 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Empathic Hex

talents.info_text:
Hexes your target, forcing it to be your thrall for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

If you damage the target, it will be freed from the hex.
talents.name: Domination Hex

talents.info_text:
Infects the target with parasitic carrion worm larvae for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Each turn the disease will remove a beneficial physical effect and deal 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 acid and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 blight damage.

If not cleared after five turns it will inflict 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 acid damage as the larvae hatch, removing the effect but spawning a full grown carrion worm mass near the target's location.
talents.name: Worm Rot

name: horror spells
description: Spell talents of the various horrors of the world.

talents.info_text:
Corrupted vapour rises at the target location (radius 4) doing 42, 57, 68, 78, 87 blight damage every turn for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with Magic stat.
talents.name: Blightzone

name: other
description: Talents of the various entities of the world.

talents.info_text:
Fires a bolt of pure filth, diseasing your target with a disease doing 49, 64, 75, 85, 94 blight damage per turn for 6 turns, and reducing one of its physical stats (strength, constitution, dexterity) by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45. The three diseases can stack.

Virulent Disease will always try to apply a disease the target does not currently have, and also one that will have the most debilitating effect for the target.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Virulent Disease

talents.info_text:
Make your target's diseases burst, doing 55, 75, 90, 103, 115 blight damage for each disease it is infected with.

This will also spread any decrepitude, weakness, rotting or epidemic diseases to any nearby foes in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Cyst Burst

talents.info_text: All your foes within a radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball infected with a disease enter a cataleptic state, stunning them for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns and dealing 131%, 143%, 152%, 159%, 166% of all remaining disease damage instantly.
talents.name: Catalepsy

talents.info_text:
Infects the target with a very contagious disease, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 damage per turn for 6 turns.

If any blight damage from non-diseases hits the target, the epidemic may activate and spread a random disease to nearby targets within a radius 2 ball.

The chance to spread increases with the blight damage dealt and is 100% if it is at least 31%, 23%, 19%, 16%, 14% of the target's maximum life.

Creatures suffering from that disease will also suffer healing reduction (45%, 51%, 56%, 60%, 63%) and diseases immunity reduction (38%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 64%).

Epidemic is an extremely potent disease; as such, it fully ignores the target's diseases immunity.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower, and the spread chance increases with the amount of blight damage dealt.
talents.name: Epidemic
Corrupted Strength
talents.info_text:
Allows you to dual wield any type of one handed weapons, and increases the damage of the off-hand weapon to 54%, 61%, 65%, 69%, 72%.

Also, casting a spell (which uses a turn) will give a free melee attack at a random target in melee range for 80%, 93%, 102%, 111%, 118% blight damage.

Each time you deal damage to one of your foes, you enter a bloodlust-infused frenzy, increasing your Spellpower by 1 (maximum 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 Spellpower per turn, 8, 16, 24, 31, 37 Spellpower overall), and extending any current frenzy for an additional turn.

The frenzy lasts up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns, and the bonus decreases by 50%, 33%, 20%, 17%, 14% of its current value each turn you don't deal damage.
talents.name: Bloodlust
Carrier
talents.info_text:
You gain a 31%, 57%, 69%, 75%, 80% resistance to diseases, and each of your melee attacks have a 6%, 11%, 16%, 20%, 24% chance to spread any diseases on your target.

(As the Epidemic talent with the melee attack treated like blight damage.)

Your blood turns into an acidic mixture. When you get hit, the attacker is splashed with acid.

This deals 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 acid damage each turn for 5 turns, and reduces the attacker's Accuracy by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45.

At level 3, it will also reduce Armour by 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 for 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Acid Blood

name: reaving combat
description: Enhanced melee combat through the dark arts.

talents.info_text:
Fires a bolt of blight, doing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 blight damage and replenishing 20% of it as vim energy.

The amount of vim regained depends on the target's rank (higher ranks give more vim).

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Drain

talents.info_text: For 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, your corruption spells will consume health instead of vim if their cost is higher than your vim.
talents.name: Bloodcasting

talents.info_text:
Absorbs the life force of your foes as you kill them.

As long as this talent is active, vim will decrease by 0.5 per turn and increase by 7.1, 11, 14, 16, 19 for each kill of a non-undead creature (in addition to the usual increase based on Willpower).
talents.name: Absorb Life

talents.info_text: Tap your life force to provide a furious boost, increasing all damage you deal by 8.9%, 12%, 14%, 16%, 18% for 7 turns.
talents.name: Life Tap

name: sanguisuge
description: Manipulate life force to feed your own dark powers.

talents.info_text:
Hit the target with both weapons, doing 120%, 137%, 150%, 161%, 171% damage with each hit. For each hit, the target will bleed for 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 damage each turn for 5 turns.

The bleeding effect will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Rend

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on the corruption you bring, enhancing each of your melee strikes with 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 blight damage (which also heals you for 10, 14, 17, 19, 21 each hit).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ruin

talents.info_text:
Strike with each of your weapons, doing 120%, 137%, 150%, 161%, 171% acid weapon damage with each hit.

If at least one of the strikes hits, an acid splash is generated, doing 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 acid damage to all targets other than yourself adjacent to the foe you struck.

The splash damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Acid Strike

talents.info_text: Hits the target with your main weapon, doing 100%, 117%, 130%, 141%, 151% darkness weapon damage. If the attack hits you attack with your second weapon, doing 100%, 117%, 130%, 141%, 151% blight weapon damage and granting an automatic critical. If the second attack hits, the target is blinded for 4 turns.
talents.name: Dark Surprise

name: scourge
description: Bring pain and destruction to the world.

talents.info_text:
Turn into a wraith, allowing you to walk through walls (but not preventing suffocation) for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Also increases your Defense and Armour by 11, 15, 19, 21, 24 and 9, 12, 14, 17, 18, respectively.

If you are still in a wall when the effect ends you will randomly teleport.

The bonuses will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Wraithform

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of shadowflame that moves toward the target and explodes into a flash of darkness and fire, doing 75, 101, 122, 139, 154 fire damage and 75, 101, 122, 139, 154 darkness damage in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Darkfire

talents.info_text:
Call upon the essence of the supreme demon overlord Urh'Rok to turn into a demon.

While in demon form, you gain 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% fire resistance, 22%, 29%, 35%, 41%, 45% darkness resistance, and your global speed is increased by 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18%.

The flames of the Fearscape will heal you while in demon form.

The resistances and heal will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flame of Urh'Rok

talents.info_text:
Summon a part of the Fearscape to intersect with the current level.

Your target and yourself are taken to the Fearscape, trapped there until you end the spell or until your target dies.

While inside, a constant aura of flames will burn both of you (and heal demons) for 93, 126, 152, 174, 193 fire damage.

When the spell ends, only you and the target (if still alive) are taken back to your home plane; all summons are left in the Fearscape.

Objects will be moved as well.

This spell has no effect if cast when already inside the Fearscape.

This powerful spell drains 5 vim per turn, ending when it reaches 0.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fearscape

name: Shadowflame
description: Harness the power of the demonic shadowflame.
All the tools to torment your foes.
name: torment

talents.info_text:
You set your mind toward a single goal: the destruction of all your foes.

Increases the maximum amount of vim you can store by 25, 44, 61, 77, 92.
talents.name: Willful Tormenter

talents.info_text: Reach out and touch the blood and health of your foes. Any creatures caught in the radius 2 ball will be unable to heal above their current life value (at the time of the casting) for 4, 7, 10, 12, 14 turns.
talents.name: Blood Lock

talents.info_text:
When you kill a creature, the remainder of the damage done will not be lost. Instead, 66%, 71%, 75%, 77%, 79% of it will splash in a radius 2 as blight damage.

The splash damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Overkill
Blood Vengeance
talents.info_text:
When you are dealt a blow that reduces your life by at least 14%, 12%, 10%, 9%, 9%, you have a 49%, 55%, 58%, 61%, 63% chance to reduce the remaining cooldown of all your spells by 1.

The chance will increase with your Spellpower.

description: Manipulate life for your vile needs.
name: vile life

talents.name: Blood Splash
talents.info_text:
Inflicting pain and death invogorates you.

Each time you deal a critical strike you gain 14, 29, 41, 51, 60 life (this effect can only happen once per turn).

Each time you kill a creature you gain 14, 29, 41, 51, 60 life (this effect can only happen once per turn).

Use elemental damage deal to you to trigger terrible effects on the source:

  • Fire: burn for 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage over 5 turns
  • Cold: freeze for 3 turns with 350, 474, 571, 652, 725 iceblock power
  • Acid: blind for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns
  • Lightning: daze for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns
  • Nature: 20%, 35%, 41%, 45%, 48% slow for 4 turns

This effect can only happen once every 10 turns per damage type.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Elemental Discord

talents.info_text:
You manipulate the vim of your target to temporarily invert all healing done to it (but not regeneration).

For 5 turns all healing will instead damage them for 44%, 52%, 56%, 59%, 62% of the healing done as blight.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Healing Inversion

talents.info_text:
You transfer up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 physical or magical detrimental effects currently affecting you to a nearby creature by touching it.

The transfer takes 9.1%, 6.8%, 5.6%, 4.9%, 4.4% of your remaining life for each effect transferred and heals the target for the same amount.

The chance to transfer each effect increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Vile Transplant

talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of pure blight, doing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 blight damage.

This spell has an improved critical strike chance of +8.67%, +15%, +21%, +26%, +31%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Soul Rot

talents.info_text:
Feel the very existence of creatures around you for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, in a radius of 10.

The evil touch will reduce their blight resistance by 28%, 38%, 46%, 53%, 59%, but also make them aware of you.

The resistance reduction will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Vimsense

talents.info_text: Each time a creature affected by vimsense hurts you, you regain 3.96, 4.95, 5.82, 6.62, 7.37 vim and 9.11, 13, 17, 21, 24 health.
talents.name: Leech

talents.info_text:
Open a dark portal (radius 3) to the target zone. All creatures caught inside will be teleported to your location, and you to theirs.

All creatures (except you) traversing the portal will catch a random disease, doing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 blight damage per turn for 6 turns and reducing one of its physical stats (strength, constitution, dexterity) by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dark Portal

name: vim
description: Touch the very essence of your victims.
